name: karma-oojspec
description: A Karma plugin - adapter for oojspec testing framework.
author: Frederico Schardong <frede.sch@gmail.com>

scripts.preinstall: git -C oojspec submodule update --init --recursive && cd node_modules && git clone git@github.com:fredericoschardong/karma.git && cd karma && npm install && rm -Rf node_modules/karma && cd node_modules && ln -s ../ karma && cd ../ && node_modules/grunt-cli/bin/grunt browserify
